= Subversion =

If you want to retrieve GoogleCode projects, you will need SVN configured in your Eclipse IDE.
To do so, you should see this page : *[http://benjchristensen.com/2009/06/24/eclipse-galileo-3-5-and-subversion/ Configure Subversion]*
